mapper.update: UPDATE EAT_RESTAURANT SET RS_READCOUNT = RS_READCOUNT+1 WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM RESTAURANT_REVIEW WHERE RS_SEQ=#{seq}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM RESTAURANT_LIKES WHERE RS_SEQ=#{seq}

SELECT RNUM,SEQ FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, SEQ FROM(SELECT SEQ FROM EAT_RESTAURANT WHERE (RS_NAME || RS_ADDRESS1 || RS_ADDRESS2 || RS_MENU || RS_KEYWORD || RS_CATEGORY) LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT RS_SEQ AS SEQ FROM RESTAURANT_REVIEW WHERE RS_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%')) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(SEQ), 0) AS CNT FROM( SELECT SEQ FROM EAT_RESTAURANT WHERE 1=1
AND (RS_NAME || RS_ADDRESS1 || RS_ADDRESS2 || RS_MENU || RS_KEYWORD || RS_CATEGORY) LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'
UNION SELECT RS_SEQ AS SEQ FROM RESTAURANT_REVIEW WHERE 1=1
AND RS_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%')

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS CNT FROM EAT_RESTAURANT WHERE 1=1
AND RS_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{s_category}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTAURANT_LIKES(SEQ, ID, RS_SEQ, RS_NAME) VALUES(LIKES_SEQ.nextval, #{id}, #{rs_seq}, #{rs_name})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESTAURANT_LIKES WHERE ID=#{id} AND RS_SEQ=#{rs_seq}
